text: Vaqte ki pajomʙaron suxanoni qavmasonro sunidand, ʙarojason guftand: Mo ʙa cuz odami monandi sumo kasi digar nestem, vale Alloh ʙa har jake az ʙandagonas, ki ʙixohad, ne'mati farovon medihad va ʙa risolati xud ʙarmeguzinad. Va on ci talaʙ dored az daleli ravsan moro mumkin nest, ki cuz ʙa hukmi Alloh huccate ʙijovarem va mu'minon dar hama korason ʙar Alloh tavakkal mekunand
